headline: Equinix Opens First AI-Ready Data Center in Chennai
summary: Equinix, Inc. (Nasdaq: EQIX), the world's digital infrastructure company®, announced the opening of its first International Business Exchange™ (IBX®) data center in Chennai, India—CN1. Located in Siruseri, Tamil Nadu, on a nearly six-acre plot of land, this new facility will be interconnected with Equinix's Mumbai campus, which consists of three IBX data centers. With its strategic location, rapid cloud adoption and strong data sovereignty framework, India is becoming an essential market for glo

headline: Turkey Data Center Colocation Market Report 2025-2030: Coverage of 32 Existing and 4 Upcoming Facilities Across 7+ Cities
summary: Key growth drivers in Turkey's data center colocation market include AI adoption, government support, rapid digitalization, and 5G deployment. With 32 operational facilities and prominent providers like Turkcell, Turk Telekom, Equinix, and Vodafone, Istanbul stands out as a preferred region for development. headline: Oman Data Center Colocation Market Report 2025-2030 | Occupancy Rates to Soar to 93% by 2030
summary: Leading operators in the Oman data center colocation market like Equinix and Ooredoo are expanding their facilities, enhancing market revenue shares. By 2030, the average occupancy rate of data centers in Oman is anticipated to hit 93%, driven by key players like Datamount, CloudAcropolis, and Oman Data Park. The report offers comprehensive insights into market size, demand forecasts, and sustainability trends. New entrants such as Gulf Data Hub and pivotal upcoming submarine cables underscore t
